title: The Tomb of Souls
description:
THE TREASURE HUNTRESS RETURNS

Simone Cassidy has put off treasure hunting temporarily while venturing off to uncover the more important mystery - who were her parents, and was it really a car accident that took their lives all those years ago, or something more nefarious?Another offer from Clark Bannicheck and his team pulls her into a quest to locate an object that doesn't take lives, but saves them - an artifact with impossible healing properties. But could she trust the man who might be responsible for the death of her parents?With an unscrupulous Saudi prince, a ruthless weapons dealer, and a vengeful assassin all closing in, Simone finds herself in the most perilous quest of her life.Adventure awaits in The Tomb of Souls.THE TREASURE HUNTRESS SERIES  The Serpent's Fang  The Tomb of Souls  coming Summer 2018 For more information, visitÂ sunbirdbooks.org.
author: Ryan Mullaney
